hibernate-mapping.query: Select distinct(ent) from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.IpPoolManagementHB ip inner join ip.virtualDataCenter vdc inner join vdc.enterpriseHB ent where vdc.idDataCenter = :datacenterId and ent.name like :filterLike

Select ip from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.VlanNetworkHB vlan inner join vlan.configuration conf, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.DHCPServiceHB dhcp inner join dhcp.ipPoolManagement ip left join ip.virtualMachine vm left join ip.virtualApp vapp left join ip.virtualDataCenter vdc left join vdc.enterpriseHB ent where vlan.vlanNetworkId = :vlanId and conf.dhcpService.dhcpServiceId = dhcp.dhcpServiceId and ( ip.ip like :filterLike or ip.mac like :filterLike or ip.vlanNetworkName like :filterLike or vapp.name like :filterLike or vm.name like :filterLike or ent.name like :filterLike )

Select ip from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.VlanNetworkHB vlan inner join vlan.configuration conf, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.DHCPServiceHB dhcp inner join dhcp.ipPoolManagement ip where vlan.vlanNetworkId = :vlanId and conf.dhcpService.dhcpServiceId = dhcp.dhcpServiceId and ip.virtualMachine is null and ( ip.ip like :filterLike or ip.mac like :filterLike or ip.vlanNetworkName like :filterLike )
Select ip from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.IpPoolManagementHB ip where ip.virtualMachine.idVm = :vmId and ip.rasd.resourceSubType = '0'

Select ip from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.VlanNetworkHB vlan inner join vlan.configuration conf, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.DHCPServiceHB dhcp inner join dhcp.ipPoolManagement ip where vlan.vlanNetworkId = :vlanId and conf.dhcpService.dhcpServiceId = dhcp.dhcpServiceId and ip.ip = :ip

Select vlan from com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.VlanNetworkHB vlan inner join vlan.configuration.dhcpService dhcp, com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.IpPoolManagementHB ip where dhcp.dhcpServiceId = ip.dhcpServiceId and ip.idManagement = :id_pool
SELECT ippool FROM com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.IpPoolManagementHB ippool WHERE ippool.virtualMachine.idVm != :idVm AND ippool.vlanNetworkId = :vlanNetworkId
SELECT ippool FROM com.abiquo.abiserver.business.hibernate.pojohb.networking.IpPoolManagementHB ippool WHERE ippool.virtualMachine.idVm = :idVm
